name: You deserve Butter!
description:
Save a chicken, from a butter chicken factory. After eating a plate of butter chicken you feel some weird side-effects. Can you go through all the levels and escape without giving up?

(If you're stuck at the jumps, try to jump and dash diagonally to get more height and distance, I know it's not well explained, I'm sorry for that)

(Assets downloaded from Kenney.nl)
